thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 16 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Town Health International Medical To Record FY Share Of Loss Of A JV Of HK$20 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Town Health International Medical To Record FY Share Of Loss Of A JV Of HK$20 Mln

organizations.name: reuters) - town health international medical group ltd

text:
April 16 (Reuters) - Town Health International Medical Group Ltd:
* WOULD RECORD SHARE OF LOSS OF A JOINT VENTURE IN AMOUNT OF APPROXIMATELY HK$20 MILLION FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* JV REFERS TO ALLIANCE OWNED AS TO 51% BY GROUP, NAMELY, SKY VIEW INVESTMENT LIMITED
* POSSIBLE THAT GROUP WOULD RECORD IMPAIRMENT LOSSES IN MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF APPROXIMATELY HK$236 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
